name: image-generation
description: Generate, edit, and create variations of images using AI model APIs. Supports multiple models, sizes, quality levels, and styles. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: image_generation
toolDefinition.description: Generate images from text prompts, create variations of existing images, edit images with text instructions, and list available models. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access (BYOK).

action.description: generate (create image from prompt), variations (generate variations of an image), edit (edit image with prompt), list_models (list available models)

prompt.description: Text prompt describing the image to generate. Required for generate and edit actions.

imageUrl.description: URL of the source image. Required for variations and edit actions.

mask.description: URL of the mask image for edit action. Transparent areas indicate where the image should be edited.

model.description: Model to use for generation (default: dall-e-3).

n.description: Number of images to generate (default: 1, max: 4).
